# datapower_gwsremotedebug (Resource)

GatewayScript Remote Debugger
  - CLI Alias: `gatewayscript-remote-debug`

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "datapower_gwsremotedebug" "test" {
  local_port    = 9229
  local_address = "0.0.0.0"
}
```
